name: Raido
description:
Created for the Transmission theme in Global Game Jam 2018

Collect batteries and dish out electric pain as you balance your own powers with your mission to collect enough batteries to save the town!

The 48-hour team:

Tim Callahan - Game Design
Johans Court - Additional Art
Parker Dorsey - Prop Artist
Zara Fox - Characters/Animation
Michael N. Gow - Prop Artist
Julia Rolander - Background Artist
Davanda Williamson - Concept, General Artist
